data.description: Portuguese words from singular to plural
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Converting words from singular to plural can be very handy when
    dealing with automatic natural language processing.

    The module should also include a way to convert from plural to
    singular, as a function to identify if a word is singular or plural
    (or, in special cases, if it can't be decided). These other
    functions will be implemented soon.
